sk1.name: Shockwave
sk1.desc: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.

sk2.name: Empower
sk2.desc: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.

sk3.name: Skewer
sk3.desc: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk. Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.

sk4.name: Reverse Polarity
sk4.desc: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.
